title: Interactive Exercise
description:
Create a SQLAlchemy model for a bookstore:
1. Define a Book model with: id, title, author, price, in_stock (boolean)
2. Define an Order model with: id, book_id (foreign key), quantity, order_date
3. Create relationships between Book and Order
4. Write queries to: find all books in stock, get orders for a specific book
instructions: Create a SQLAlchemy model for a bookstore with Book and Order models.

hints.text: Use Column(Integer, primary_key=True) for id. Use ForeignKey('books.id') for book_id. Use relationship() for bidirectional access.
